=head1 NAME

KinoSearch::Doc::HitDoc - A document read from an index.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    while ( my $hit_doc = $hits->next ) {
        print "$hit_doc->{title}\n";
        print $hit_doc->get_score . "\n";
        ...
    }



=head1 DESCRIPTION

A document read from an index.

HitDoc is the search-time relative of the index-time class Doc; it is
augmented by a numeric score attribute that Doc doesn't have.



=head1 METHODS

=head2 set_score(score)

Set score attribute.

=head2 get_score()

Get score attribute.





=head1 INHERITANCE

KinoSearch::Doc::HitDoc isa L<KinoSearch::Doc> isa L<KinoSearch::Object::Obj>.
